thread.section_title: Templatemonster Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of Templatemonster | www.templatemonster.com | 5 of 63
thread.title: Chuck Royer

author: Chuck Royer
title: Chuck Royer
text: I was assisted by two wonderful, friendly, patient, knowledgeable, supportive and highly professional customer support assistants - Alison and Crystal. My initial support came from Crystal and then Alison took over and so much was accomplished by their expertise I was able to make some important adjustments to the template I was using to build one of my customers new website. My opinion about TemplateMonster is off the 5 star charts - and because of that reason I will always purchase and tell others about TemplateMonster.
